system.Text:
__When you act in direct support of an ally__, envision how you aid them. Then, @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.a2d7793b23c17489]{Secure an Advantage} or @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.3f5a834fa3fea5d1]{Gain Ground} to take action. If you score a hit, they (instead of you) take the benefits of the move.

If you @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.3f5a834fa3fea5d1]{Gain Ground} and score a strong hit, you are both in control. On a __weak hit__, your ally is in control but you are in a bad spot.

Trigger.Text: When you act in direct support of an ally...
